name: Coloring Game: Studio
description:
Coloring Game: Studio is now not only paint by numbers, but also a small graphics editor. You can not only get rid of stress by painting pixels, but also show your creative nature by changing the base pictures.

At the moment, the game has:

(in brackets it is indicated what will be in version 1.0)

  • 90 pictures (150 pictures)
  • 2,500,000px (3,500,000px)
  • Basic image editor (possibility to upload any images)
